DESCRIPTION.BODY: Relie ton ID PSN à ton compte Pottermore.com pour accéder à du contenu et des zones supplémentaires. Tu peux t'inscrire et créer un compte gratuitement sur Pottermore.com.
Verbinde deine PSN-ID mit deinem Pottermore.com-Konto, um auf weitere Inhalte und Bereiche zuzugreifen. Du kannst ein kostenloses Konto auf Pottermore.com einrichten.
Collega il tuo ID PSN al tuo account Pottermore.com per accedere a spazi e contenuti aggiuntivi. Puoi iscriverti con un account gratuito su Pottermore.com.
Vincula tu ID de PSN a tu cuenta de Pottermore.com para acceder a contenido y espacios adicionales. Puedes registrar una cuenta sin coste alguno en Pottermore.com.
PSNのIDとPottermore.comのアカウントを連携させると、追加コンテンツと場所が手に入る。無料のアカウントは、Pottermore.comで作成できるよ。
Link your PSN ID to your Pottermore.com account to access additional content and spaces. You can sign up for a free account at Pottermore.com.

You've got a chance to purchase "Xi: Continuum - Axiom Agent Pack" at cheaper price NOW!\nDon't forget to check out new fantastic items out today too!
您現在有機會用優惠價購買「Xi: Continuum - Axiom Agent Pack」！\n別忘了順便看看今天發售的新夢幻道具！

ITEM.TEXT: Pick up a Lock-a-doodle Doodle Pack!
新的Lock-a-doodle繪畫包(Doodle Pack)，任您選擇！

DESCRIPTION.HEADER: Pick up a Lock-a-doodle Doodle Pack!
新的Lock-a-doodle繪畫包(Doodle Pack)，任您選擇！
DESCRIPTION.BODY: Expand your portfolio by using Lock-a-doodles latest Doodle Packs! Sodium fans will be pleased with the Sodium2 pack available exclusively via the Gift Machine. We also have Iron Fusion and Medusa packs in the store. Each pack includes new words, colours, stickers and stamps to enhance the Lock-a-doodle game!
用Lock-a-doodle的最新繪畫包(Doodle Pack)擴張您的選擇！Sodium粉絲們可購買禮品販賣機專賣的Sodium2繪畫包。我們還有在商店裡為您準備Iron Fusion及梅杜莎繪畫包。每個繪畫包包括新的單字、顏色、以及印花，讓Lock-a-doodle遊戲變得更好玩！
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!

ITEM.TEXT: 黑超特警組擴充活動功能道具

DESCRIPTION.HEADER: 黑超特警組擴充活動功能道具
DESCRIPTION.BODY:
Coming from your friends at LOOT™ are five new Men in Black™ Locomotions that will have you riding - and flying - around PlayStation®Home.
Be like one of the Agents, saving the galaxy in style with your very own Monocycle and Jetpack. 

“MEN IN BLACK” TM & © 2012 Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. All rights reserved.

您的LOOT™的好友們為您準備了5項黑超特警組擴充活動功能道具，讓您能自由駕駛及飛翔於PlayStation®Home。
就像電影的探員一樣，您可以用Monocycle及Jetpack氣派地拯救銀河。

“MEN IN BLACK” TM & © 2012 Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. All rights reserved.
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!
